overview_summary: All three adjacent landowners have no recorded stance regarding the development. Two of the neighbors (the Town and a major company) wield high influence in the community, while the one private individual has low influence.

approach_recommendations.engage: Coordinate through the Town Supervisor and Board, emphasizing local economic benefits and regulatory compliance.
Contact the 3M plant management early to share project details and address any operational concerns.
